p: You may argue that if everyone were like you—became vegetarian, drove less, and moved to smaller dwellings—the overall impact could be pretty significant. While residential energy use accounts for 16% of total energy use in the USA (U.S. Energy Information Administration 2019) and residential plus commercial water use accounts for 12% of freshwater use in the USA (U.S. Geological Survey 2016), it will take a lot of resources to conduct mass public education campaigns on sustainable living and many of them do not result in behavior change.
